sourcesContent:
<form [formGroup]="candidateForm" (ngSubmit)="submitForm()">
    <label for="name">Name:</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" formControlName="name" required>
  
    <label for="email">Email:</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" formControlName="email" required>

    <label for="mobile">Mobile:</label>
    <input type="tel" id="email" formControlName="mobile" required>

    <label for="company">Current company:</label>
    <input type="text" id="company" formControlName="company" required>

    <label for="designation">Designation:</label>
    <input type="text" id="designation" formControlName="designation" required>
  
    <label for="resume">Resume:</label>
    <input type="file" id="resume" formControlName="resume" required>
  
    <button type="submit">Submit</button>
  </form>
